name: Bananarang: The Scattered Shards
description:
A classic, imaginative legend for the ages!!

The Crystaleye Twins have shattered Banana Person's crystal into 540 scattered shards! You must travel to 9 different lands to collect them all- but be careful, as each area will end with a battle!

Bananarang: The Scattered Shards is an electrifying fun time, filled with memorable characters, unique mechanics, humorous moments and tight bosses that will keep you engaged the whole way through! There are surprises around every turn, and nine wacky worlds of whimsical fun!! Plus... some secrets?

This game will take you back to SNES-era gaming, with fun characters, engaging boss battles, and lots of surprises and secrets to find!

Originally released October 21st, 2022
Special thanks to SheepTester for code/exporting help
